tweet: Hi Ivana,  Actually, between 2003-2018, the previous @OntLiberal  govt built 14,560 new LTC beds & redeveloped an additional 15,712. This is confirmed by the MLTC.    In 2018, we also allocated funding for an additional 5000 new LTC beds. To date, your govt has yet to build them.
